website_summaries.verdict: Lifts up hair, especially at the roots, without making your hair feel heavy.
pros: Does not take a lot of product to work well
Very effective on chemically treated or colored hair
Works for both straight and wavy hair types
cons: Has a bit of a strong perfume for some people
The conditioner that goes with this shampoo doesn't rate well

customer_reviews.title: Gives fine thinning hair height and volume.
customer_reviews.text: I love Sachajuan products. After a month of regular use my aging, fine and thinning hair looks plumper and thicker. I also can say that it must clean my scalp better. I can wait 4 days between shampoos. The price is a huge bargain. I love the scent. I couldn't be more pleased with this thickening shampoo. I've bought almost every brand on the market but Sachajuan lives up to the hype and without the hefty price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: thickness and clean
customer_reviews.text: It is really good for thickness. After cleaning, you could feel the hair is light than usual. And my hair clean could keep clean more days without washing. The scent is light, doesn't feel it much. The disadvantage is that it is in a small bottle, so it's much more expensive than average. And the bottle caps is very inconvenient, you have to push the bottle hard to pour out some shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Adds thickness and body to my hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: My coworker recommended this shampoo because my hair was falling out from stress and I love it. It makes my hair look thick and full bodied. I’m about to order my third bottle right now.
customer_reviews.author: Zandra33

customer_reviews.title: MiB fail
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special at all, quite disappointed. Three stars for the shampoo minus a star for the price. If you’e buying based on MEN IN BLAZERS pod: #1 It is a shampoo recommendation from a bald guy. Think about it. #2 As a rule of thumb, avoid Davo’s products and buy Rog’s books. There are exceptions (e.g. SOAP ON A ROPE).
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kruthoffer

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected but still a fairly good prodct
customer_reviews.text: both the shampoo and conditioner made my hair feel nice after I dried it. Not so much volume though, but a decent product. Don't think I'll be purchasing again since I was looking specifically for a thickener, and for the price it just didn't fit the bill.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shampoo

product_meta.title: SACHAJUAN Thickening Shampoo, 8.4 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Shampoo with Ocean Silk and Thickening Technology gives your hair smooth volume. The hair is nourished, providing a foundation for amazing styling. Heat and UV protectants work together to make your hair become healthier and shinier. Massage a small amount into wet hair. Rinse thoroughly. follow with SACHAJUAN Thickening Conditioner. SACHAJUAN is driven by the beauty of simplicity. Our approach to hair care is simple: cleanse, condition, and add treatments if needed, to build a uniform foundation for styling. Our goal is to make hair look, feel and move like hair, but better. By strengthening and protecting hair’s natural characteristics, we can improve it – making it easier to care for and control. Inspired by this, we designed our Ocean Silk Technology to help create the desired result for every client. It's a process we've worked with and mastered as professionals, and through the development of each product. We want to give people that feeling of having simply beautiful hair.

BRAND STORY
SACHAJUAN is driven by the beauty of simplicity. Our products help achieve a personal look in the easiest possible way. Each one is designed to produce an effortless look, enabling a confident, modern and personal twist.
